name: bamboo & shell pendant on leather cord
description:
Organic and exotic, you are bound to receive compliments.

Hanging on a tan leather cord by a basic square knot, a cross section slice of bamboo was created to make the pendant which has a tiny drilled hole on one end for a silver wire wrapped pearl and hand picked, on a Maui beach, leopard print looking shell piece  dangles freely beneath. A silver claw clasp and jump ring secure leather cord.

NOTE: Each shell pendent is unique as it is found in nature therefore the shape, color will vary. Email  us for pictures of available selection.

ENTIRE LENGTH (includes. Pendant)= 16” (400mm)
PENDANT LENGTH= 3.5” (83mm)

name: glass pebble pendants (medium)
description:
Organic, this piece will be a very special addition to your collection.

The clear glass domed pebble reveals a beautiful paper print pattern (no two will be exactly the same). The backing of the pendant is coated with a special craft adhesive that is water repellent, but not water resistant, please be sure to remove before any water exposure. Let us know if you would like to see a contact sheet of available print patterns and please specify if you would like a gold or silver bail.

OPTIONAL ADD: tan or black colored double strand (faux) leather cord with claw clasp (additional costs apply. Please complete the  inquiry form today for a quote).

IMPORTANT NOTE: Please note that we use non-toxic craft adhesives and paints, and metals for the bails are usually silver or gold plated/coated with a copper metal core. If you have any skin allergies, please let us know immediately and we can discuss a custom order to fit your needs. Sterling silver and gold filled are available.  Thank you.

ENTIRE LENGTH = 1.5” (40mm)
PENDANT DIAMETER = 1” (25mm)
